content: पुरंदरः [पुरः शत्रूणां नगराणि दारयति खच्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Indra; <ls>R. 2. 74.</ls> {@--2@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--3@} Of Agni. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the eighteenth lunar mansion (ज्येष्ठा). {@--6@} A thief, house-breaker. --रा An epithet of the Ganges.
